sentences.en: A great throng packed out the theater and overflowed into the corridors.
sentences.cn: 一大群人坐满剧院并且还有人涌到了走廊上.

sentences.en: A patient throng was waiting in silence.
sentences.cn: 一大群耐心的人在静静地等着.

sentences.en: A throng of shoppers pushed against one another to the display tables of the department store.
sentences.cn: 一群顾客你推我搡地挤到百货公司的展示柜台前.

sentences.en: Amid this closely pressing throng, there must be Roberta's father and mother.
sentences.cn: 在拥挤的人群中间, 一定有罗伯塔的父母.

sentences.en: An official pushed through the throng.
sentences.cn: 一名官员费力地挤过人群。

sentences.en: By degrees the throng dispersed; the carriages drove off.
sentences.cn: 人群渐渐地散光了; 车辆也驶走了.

sentences.en: Crowds of people throng round the great man whenever he goes.
sentences.cn: 无论这个大人物走到哪里,都有一群人簇拥在他的周围.

sentences.en: Homeward bound , the six o'clock throng bumped and jostled.
sentences.cn: 那些6点钟刚下班的人们拥挤着往家走.

sentences.en: Mike dashed through the throng of people on the street.
Mr. Lorry handed him a paper through the throng.'
sentences.cn: 罗瑞先生在人群中塞给他一张纸条.

sentences.en: On the square there was a wildly cheering throng.
sentences.cn: 广场上有一大群欢呼雷动的人群.

sentences.en: She got lost in the throng.
The evening passed all too quickly for the throng of dancers.
sentences.cn: 对大批跳舞的人来说,这天晚上过得真是太快了.

sentences.en: The jubilant throng is like the waves of the sea.
sentences.cn: 欢腾的人群宛如大海的波涛.

sentences.en: They throng the beaches between late June and early August.
sentences.cn: 6月底到8月初，他们群聚在海滩上。

sentences.en: Tourists thronged the bars and restaurants.
sentences.cn: 游客挤满了酒吧和餐馆。

sentences.en: We pushed our way through the throng.

trans.tran_en: a large group of people in one place
if people throng a place, they go there in large numbers
